entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 05:57 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
